response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Should you require any further information or discuss the specifics of how this product can be integrated into your business, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
